Addendum-III to AVSEC Order No. 3/2022

Subject: Procedure for carriage of weapons and ammunition by Personal
Security Officers (PSOs) of VVIPs, and/or persons/ passengers.

In exercise of powers conferred under rules 30 (a), 30 (b) and 62 of the Aircraft
(Security) Rules, 2023, the Director General, Bureau of Civil Aviation Security, for
the purpose of the safety of passengers, crew, ground personnel and the general
public in all matters relating to safeguarding against act of unlawful interference
with civil aviation, directs for partial modification to AvSec Order No. 3/2022 dated
10.3.2022 issued on the subject.

2. Sub-para: 3.5.4 is hereby inserted after Sub-para: 3.5.3 of AO-3/2022 which
reads as under:

“Aircraft operators to implement procedures to ensure that armed personnel, prior
to boarding an aircraft, are fully briefed and aware of the rules and regulations
pertaining to the carriage, risk and use of weapons on board an aircraft and also
to be given instructions regarding rules and regulations pertaining to the carriage
of weapons in the State of arrival as well as the State of departure, and those at
any intermediate stops.”

3.All other provisions of Addendum to BCAS AvSec Order No. 3/2022 dated
10.3.2022 shall remain unchanged. The above amendment shall be implemented
with immediate effect.
